alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINDY CONDITIONS ON ELEVATED BRIDGES AND OVERPASSES ACROSS THE CHARLESTON METRO AREA... Southwest winds of 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph will continue across the Charleston Metro Area into the afternoon. Winds may gust as high as 40 to 45 mph over some of the elevated bridges and overpasses which could pose a risk for motorists, especially those driving high profile vehicles. Some of the bridges at risk for higher wind gusts include the Ravenel Bridge, the Don Holt Bridge, the James B. Edwards Bridge, the Ben Sawyer Bridge, the Isle of Palms connector, the John F. Limehouse Bridge, the Paul J. Gelegotis Bridge and the McKinley Washington Junior Bridge.
info.instruction: Be careful when driving high profile vehicles across bridges and overpasses.
